column4: I'm having an issue with my laptop. I can't get internet. I can get in the network, I can ping other machines in the network, other people's and everything but I can't get internet. It worked fine yesterday, just not today. Could someone help me figure out why? :( I'm using nm-applet on a wireless network.
what happened between yesterday and today?
Nothing really, I didn't do anything last night other than play World of Warcraft on it
I didn't mess with any of the configuration whatsoever last night.. yesterday I was messing with my sound configuration but thats a whole different problem
are you on a static ip or dhcp?
do you have the right gateway and dns information?
check the applet for your network card's settings, or ifconfig from the cli
Ah, I see the default gateway is 192.168.1.1 but its supposed to be .7
try refreshing your connection (turn off the wifi adapter, then turn it back on, then renew your dhcp lease)
I was trying to look if it could be done from ifconfig but I could only find how to change my IP address and how to change the broadcast address, not the default gateway
I can't change that file, it will break nm-applet
Is there any other alterantive than modifying the interfaces file?
